title: Israel attacks Iran: Explosions heard in central Tehran, sirens in Tel Aviv - what we know so far
summary_full: Israel initiated a "preventative attack" on Iran Saturday, with the defense minister declaring a nationwide emergency. Explosions were reported in Tehran as sirens wailed across Israel, prompting a "proactive alert" for potential missile launches.
